nodes.text: Tor was a village on the planet Polyneus that was the home of the Polynean pilot Stam Groundling, who left Polyneus as part of the Hundred and Twenty. When Wyl Lark, another Polynean who had left as part of the Hundred and Twenty, spoke to Elder Zephyr after the skirmish at the Circus of Mortal Appetites about his desire to return home, the Elder informed Lark that Groundling had arrived back to Tor the day before.
